articles.title: Musk signals 'significantly' stepping back from Doge as Tesla profits plunge - BBC
articles.description: The tech boss says he intends to spend only one to two days a week on Trump administration matters.
articles.content:
Lily JamaliReporting from
San Francisco
Elon Musk (left) with Donald Trump outside the White House (file photo)
Tesla boss Elon Musk has pledged to "significantly" cut back his role in the US gove… [+3983 chars]
